title: Samples, ca. 1910
dimensions:
a. Warp: 23 cm [9"]  Cut top and bottom.
    Weft:  65 cm [25.5"]  Selvedge left side, cut other side.
b. Warp: 22 cm [8.5"]  Cut top and bottom.
    Weft:  65 cm [25.5"]  Selvedge left side, cut other side.
creditline: Gift of Margaret and Teresa Gloster in memory of Mary and Margaret McElligott
description:
a. rust color ground with off-white and light rust color
b. same colors as "a", but a different area of the pattern
